stories.text: I've been looking at alternatives to CMake, and i found premake. I've just been wondering, what are some interesting projects that use it?
stories.title: Ask HN: What are some (complex?) projects that use the premake build system?
γ-Linolenic Acid Makes Old Blood New Again

stories.text:
I’ve been reading a lot of books on tech start ups. I just finished hatching Twitter.

I’m very interested in scaling/architecture problems they had as they grew. It seems like these books primary audience is not technical, so these type of details are mentioned but at a very high level.

I know I can read blogs about scaling issues, and purely technical books on scalability. I’m wondering if there are any books that dive deeper into these type of problems while still talking about the journey of the business?
stories.title: Ask HN: Technically focused books on start ups
Adding fire to our falling sand simulator
